name: Foobar
description:
To arms! A strike team of TV-heads are tasked with cleansing a zombie-infested office. Escort your employees to safety before their flesh and limbs are torn apart in this out-of-control puzzle survival game. 

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit (GMTK) Game Jam 2020. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By Vampire Twin Studios (www.vampiretwin.com)

  • Shervin Mortazavi - Programming
  • Carlos Duralde - Design / Audio
  • Armin Mortazavi - Illustration / Animation
